desc: SnappyScreen is a wellness company founded by two sisters. They are known for their first SnappyScreen invention, a touchless sunscreen booth for luxury hotels that applies your sunscreen evenly in 10 seconds. They have since expanded their product line with SNAP Clean Hands hand sanitizer. Shop Now!

layout.text: 'Spring' into the future of hand sanitizer! Our best selling Touchless Mist Sanitizer, featured on Oprah’s Favorite Things, is now available in three new spring fragrances! Shop now and Save 20% with code SPRING
